system.effect: Can make warp jumps without a Navigator. But can only make Calculated Jumps, can't make warp assessments, must make Daily tests on Warp Travel Encounter table, and has no way to interface a Navigator or any other component that modifies warp travel. The Navis Nobilite dislike the existence of this item, and those that use it.
